channel.title: I need Port Fowarding Help please!
channel.description:
I've made this topic before, but i didnt get any help ... I Need step by step instructions to port foward, i have windows 7, so i dont know how to port foward correctly. when i put my LAN ip address in my browsers address bar, This is what comes up. I was told to look for 'Applications and Gaming' but i cant find it...
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/514r49.jpg[/img]
Please help :)

item.title: I need Port Fowarding Help please!
item.dc:creator: @Arcane_Mage Arcane Mage
item.description:
@Arcane_Mage wrote:

I went there, i found my router, it said i had to pay $29.95 and they would set it up for me …

*Nevermind that was just an advirtisment, i am learning how to port foward right now … thanks ;D

Read full topic
